it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.Observable<ResponseInput>
      • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<UpdateModel>, java.lang.Runnable

    public class View
extends Observable<ResponseInput>
implements Observer<UpdateModel>, java.lang.Runnable
    This class implements the server and the virtual View
    Author:
    Cysko7927

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      View(int PORT, int timer)
      Create a virtual view with inside a server that listen in a port and set a timeout that being used by server to wait before to start the match

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Connection> getConnections()
      Obtain the list of all connections
      java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getExecutor()
      Obtain the object that handle the thread
      UpdateModel getLastModelUpdated()
      Obtain the last copy immutable of the model updated
      int getLenghtTimer()
      Obtain the duration of the timer in seconds
      void getResponseWithInputs(ColorId player)
      The controller uses this method to receive the response of a request of input sand before at a player This method suspend the controller until the message doesn't arrive and at the End it calls the method update of the controller passing the response input
      java.lang.Thread getTimer()
      Get the thread that handle the timer
      void insertConnection(Connection connection)
      The behavior of this method depends by state of the Virtual View: 1)If the virtual view is in the initial state: the method insert the connection in the list ,if there are three players connected it starts the timer to wait before to start the match 2)If the match is active and there aren't player disconnected : the method doesn't insert anything 3)If the match is active and there are player disconnected : the method insert a new connection only if the player was connected before.
      boolean isCreationIsFinished()
      Say if the phase of login of the player is finished
      void requestInput(RequestInput message, ColorId player)
      The controller use this method to send a request of input a one player The method does also a ping-pong test to verify that the connection is active
      void run()
      Thread that creates the acceptors Socket and RMI
      void sendMessageGenericBroadcast(GenericMessage message)
      This method being used by controller to send a message in broadcast at all the player(Used in case of Afk for a player or disconnection)
      void setLastModelUpdated(UpdateModel lastModelUpdated)
      Change the copy immutable of the model inside the virtual view
      void setTimer(java.lang.Thread timer)
      Change the thread that handle the timer
      void update(UpdateModel message)
      If there were changes in the model the controller use this method to send the model updated at all player active The method continues to send the message until the client doesn't respond with a message of correct reception About the connections that are no active the message will not send

    • Constructor Detail

      • View

        public View(int PORT,
            int timer)
        Create a virtual view with inside a server that listen in a port and set a timeout that being used by server to wait before to start the match
        Parameters:
        PORT - number of port that will use the server for the socket
        timer - timeout used by server to wait the user after at least three user will connect. it being used by Network Handler also to wait the input of user

    • Method Detail

      • requestInput

        public void requestInput(RequestInput message,
                         ColorId player)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The controller use this method to send a request of input a one player The method does also a ping-pong test to verify that the connection is active
        Parameters:
        message - message to send to ask the input
        player - player that will receive the request of input
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there were problems with the sending

      • getResponseWithInputs

        public void getResponseWithInputs(ColorId player)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The controller uses this method to receive the response of a request of input sand before at a player This method suspend the controller until the message doesn't arrive and at the End it calls the method update of the controller passing the response input
        Parameters:
        player - player that send the response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there are problem of connection

      • sendMessageGenericBroadcast

        public void sendMessageGenericBroadcast(GenericMessage message)
        This method being used by controller to send a message in broadcast at all the player(Used in case of Afk for a player or disconnection)
        Parameters:
        message - message to send

      • update

        public void update(UpdateModel message)
        If there were changes in the model the controller use this method to send the model updated at all player active The method continues to send the message until the client doesn't respond with a message of correct reception About the connections that are no active the message will not send
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer<UpdateModel>
        Parameters:
        message - message to send that contain the model updated

      • run

        public void run()
        Thread that creates the acceptors Socket and RMI
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • insertConnection

        public void insertConnection(Connection connection)
        The behavior of this method depends by state of the Virtual View: 1)If the virtual view is in the initial state: the method insert the connection in the list ,if there are three players connected it starts the timer to wait before to start the match 2)If the match is active and there aren't player disconnected : the method doesn't insert anything 3)If the match is active and there are player disconnected : the method insert a new connection only if the player was connected before.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection to insert

        public java.lang.Thread getTimer()
        Get the thread that handle the timer
        Returns:
        thread with timer

        Change the thread that handle the timer
        Parameters:

        Obtain the object that handle the thread
        Returns:

        public java.util.List<Connection> getConnections()
        Obtain the list of all connections
        Returns:
        list of all connections

      • getLenghtTimer

        public int getLenghtTimer()
        Obtain the duration of the timer in seconds
        Returns:
        duration of the timer in seconds

      • isCreationIsFinished

        public boolean isCreationIsFinished()
        Say if the phase of login of the player is finished
        Returns:
        true if the phase of login of the player is finished

        Parameters:
